dublin_core.dcvalue: IQSMS is an application which is used to improve distribution and availability of HIV commodities in remote health facilities and to trace identified HIV positive infants in two regions in Tanzania.
Facility-based provider, Public sector health system (national, regional, district), Facility
Brandy Airall, Project Officer, Centers for Disease Control and Prevention, Address: 2448 Luthuli Road, PO Box 9124, Dar es Salaam,Tanzania; Email: bairall@cdc.gov
Centers for Disease Control and Prevention
Data collection and reporting, Supply chain management, Child health, HIV/AIDS, Maternal health, Newborn health
